name: Dr. Vestra Kell
reasonForDisplacement: Sent to investigate why Atomic Fizz Caps appear in multiple timelines simultaneously.
personality: Sharp, sarcastic, fascinated by wasteland economies.
questHooks: Wants samples of caps from different regions to compare quantum signatures.
Believes FizzCo created a blockchain-like system that spans timelines.
Warns that counterfeit caps could destabilize reality.

lore.atomicFizzRumors: Believes the caps are 'quantum receipts' from a collapsed timeline economy.
lore.fizzCoTheory: FizzCo accidentally created a cross-reality ledger.
